```{r}
# Source all helper functions
func_dir <- here::here("functions")
r_files <- list.files(func_dir, pattern = "\\.R$", full.names = TRUE)
purrr::walk(r_files, source)


```


```{r}

data_dictionary <- read.csv(file = here("data/final_codebook.csv"))

data_dictionary %>% 
kbl(align = "c", 
      col.names = c("Variable Name", "Class/Type", "Definition", 
                    "Number of Unique Values", "Example Format")
) %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("bordered")
) %>%
row_spec(0, 
         bold = TRUE, 
         background = "#0f172a",
         extra_css = "font-size: 16px!important;color:#ffffff;")

```
